name: Gravity Maze (itch) (LJLucraft)
description: You play a little robot trapped in a huge maze who must escape by using the mechanisms the steel prison offers you. Trigger the levers to open doors or close others, use the moon to atract special objects but most of all: DON'T FALL INTO THE BLACK HOLE! Made in 50 hours for the Nexus Game Jam II by: Arthur LERRA (Level Designer) Lucas JOURDAN (Lead Level Designer and Programmer) Julien CASCALES (Sound Designer) Alexandre BANNISTER (3D Artist) Yann LAUNAIS (Programmer) Wysse (Composer)
